title: New: CATHEDRALS – Harlem
content: LA duo CATHEDRALS became one of the most talked about new artists of last year with the release of their debut track, Unbound. Dreamy, synth pop, it put them on the radar of numerous blogs, and in turn labels. Their second release, Harlem, is bolder and dare I even say heavier admirably not simply reverting to replicating their debut track, but actively pushing on for a new, more confident sound, complete with guitar solo. If their first outing wasn’t enough to convince, there’s no doubting now that CATHEDRALS are the real deal.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
